description.value:
Any time you would make a melee weapon attack, you can replace it with an attempt to Shove or Trip a target, not just when taking the Attack action. While you have a free hand, you can use your minor action to Shove or Trip a creature. Creatures you successfully Trip take 1d6 bludgeoning damage when they hit the ground.
    Finally, when you are initiating or resisting an attempt to Shove or Trip, you can make a Presence (Perform) check in place of the normal check.

system.requirements: Must have the Bard Starter Abilities
